completion_requirements: You have followed up on your appointment.
completion_questions: ...stay calm and helpful throughout the dialogue?
User.task_description: You (Ben) just finished your appointment with Dr. Alexis. Unfortunately, you forgot to write down the instructions the doctor gave you. Please followup and find out how often to take your medicine.

Wizard.task_description: Inform the user of his/her doctor's orders.
completion_requirements: Informed the user about the doctor's instructions,
completion_questions: ...change his/her mind about what he/she wants at any time?
...become aggressive or annoyed during the dialogue?
